text: Ahhh #Chloroquine, the disastrous Quinoline anti-malaria drug abandoned by the Nazi’s after WWII, but later picked up by🇺🇸WRAIR & used for the Vietnam War🤔Towards the end of Vietnam, #Mefloquine(#Lariam)was born from this disaster drug & peddled to Roche for mass production 💊🧠 https://t.co/l2phTYvdow
